returns._0: Whether the current network has price feeds configured

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

configureMainnet().notice: Configure price feeds for Ethereum Mainnet

configureSepolia().notice: Configure price feeds for Sepolia testnet

emergencyReconfigure().notice: Emergency function to reconfigure all feeds for current network

getCurrentNetworkName().notice: Get network name for current chain

isCurrentNetworkConfigured().notice: Check if current network is configured

networkConfigured(uint256).notice: Mapping of network ID to whether it's configured
